name: In Transit
description:
In Transit, is a wave based co-op game. The aim of the game is to work as a team to defeat the oncoming enemies.

There are four different rooms in the ship;

  • Engine Room - Rotate and activate to move the ship
  • Turret Room - Rotate and shoot the turret to destroy enemies
  • Freeze Room - Use the activate ability to use a charge and freeze all enemies
  • Shield Room - Rotate to block incoming projectiles
